verses.verse: Now after this <S%H310><s%> it came to pass <S%H1732><s%>, that David struck <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and subdued <S%H3665><s%> them <S%H3947><s%>, and took Gath <S%H1661><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.
And he struck <S%H5221><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%>; and the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> became David <S%H1732><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>, and brought <S%H5375><s%> gifts <S%H4503><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> Hadarezer <S%H1928><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah <S%H6678><s%> unto Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, as he went <S%H3212><s%> to establish <S%H5324><s%> his dominion <S%H3027><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> from him a thousand <S%H505><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen <S%H376><s%>: David <S%H1732><s%> also hamstrung <S%H6131><s%> all the chariot <S%H7393><s%> horses <S%H3498><s%>, but reserved of them an hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%>.

And when the Syrians <S%H758><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> Hadarezer <S%H1928><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah <S%H6678><s%>, David <S%H1732><s%> killed <S%H5221><s%> of the Syrians <S%H758><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> garrisons in Syria <S%H758><s%>â€“damascus; and the Syrians <S%H758><s%> became David <S%H1732><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>, and brought <S%H5375><s%> gifts <S%H4503><s%>. Thus the Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserved <S%H3467><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> wherever he went <S%H1980><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the shields <S%H7982><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> that were on the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Hadarezer <S%H1928><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Likewise from Tibhath <S%H2880><s%>, and from Chun <S%H3560><s%>, cities <S%H5892><s%> of Hadarezer <S%H1928><s%>, brought <S%H3947><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>, with which Solomon <S%H8010><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

Now when Tou <S%H8583><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> how David <S%H1732><s%> had struck <S%H5221><s%> all the army <S%H2428><s%> of Hadarezer <S%H1928><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah <S%H6678><s%>;

He sent <S%H7971><s%> Hadoram <S%H1913><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, to inquire <S%H7592><s%> of his welfare <S%H7965><s%>, and to congratulate <S%H1288><s%> him <S%H3898><s%>, because he had fought against Hadarezer <S%H1928><s%>, and struck <S%H5221><s%> him <S%H1928><s%>; (for Hadarezer had war <S%H376><s%> with Tou <S%H8583><s%>;) and with him all manner of vessels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%>.

Them also king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> dedicated <S%H6942><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, with the silver <S%H3701><s%> and the gold <S%H2091><s%> that he brought <S%H5375><s%> from all these nations <S%H1471><s%>; from Edom <S%H123><s%>, and from Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and from the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and from Amalek <S%H6002><s%>.

Moreover Abishai <S%H52><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> killed <S%H5221><s%> of the Edomites <S%H123><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> garrisons <S%H5333><s%> in Edom <S%H123><s%>; and all the Edomites <S%H123><s%> became David <S%H1732><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>. Thus the Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserved <S%H3467><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> wherever he went <S%H1980><s%>.
So David <S%H1732><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> over all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and executed <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and justice <S%H6666><s%> among all his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%>; and Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahilud <S%H286><s%>, recorder <S%H2142><s%>.

And Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub <S%H285><s%>, and Abimelech <S%H40><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiathar <S%H54><s%>, were the priests <S%H3548><s%>; and Shavsha <S%H7798><s%> was scribe <S%H5608><s%>;

And Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> was over the Cherethites <S%H3774><s%> and the Pelethites <S%H6432><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> were chief <S%H7223><s%> about <S%H3027><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>.
